    • Method Detail

      • displayBasicAlert

        public void displayBasicAlert(@NonNull
                              java.lang.String title,
                              @NonNull
                              java.lang.String message,
                              @NonNull
                              java.lang.String button,
                              @NonNull
                              java.lang.Runnable action)
        Basic alert, aka title, message, and a neutral button. Clicking the button doesn't do anything, just acknowledges alert has been read.
        Parameters:
        title - the title of the alert
        message - the message of the alert
        button - the button text
        action - instance method to run when button is pressed
